metadata.title: CVE-2019-9717 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In Libav 12.3, a denial of service in the subtitle decoder allows attackers to hog the CPU via a crafted video file in Matroska format, because srt_to_ass in libavcodec/srtdec.c has a complex format argument to sscanf.

criterions.comment: gst-libav1.0 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
